# Configuration.UncontrolledConcurrencyTimeout property

Value that controls how much time the runtime should wait for uncontrolled concurrency to resolve before continuing exploration. This value is in milliseconds.

```csharp
public uint UncontrolledConcurrencyTimeout { get; }
```
